content.text:
Based on this application description, generate a short, concise name suitable for use as a GitHub repository name.
The name should be lowercase with words separated by hyphens (kebab-case) and should not include any special characters.
Application description: "A simple click counter application with a single button that tracks the number of clicks. The backend should persist the click count in a database, and the frontend should display the current count and allow users to increment it by clicking the button."
Return ONLY the name, nothing else.
